column4: I'd like it to have a easy key combination i can press to get curly quotes just like on the Mac in all gnome apps... has anyone got any idea (or even better know a howto) for how to do that?
how could i remove and reinstall gnome?
How does it fail? Usually brown screen with a big white rectangle at the top left
GDM loads fine, and I can load fluxbox or xterm failsafe from GDM. But not Gnome or Failsafe Gnome.
try removing your .gnome .gnome2 .gconfd .gnome2_private .metacity .nautilus and related directories in your $HOME. you will loose customizations like panel settings etc
isn't that equivalent to launching failsafe gnome?
nope using a fresh user got me a brown screen + white rectangle again
I would boot fluxbox and try to use apt-get or aptitude to download the latest updates or either dpkg-reconfigure gnome/ubuntu-desktop i suppose
my machine's already updated but i could try dpkg-reconfigure, thanks
idont know why you are having troubles, I downloaded the latest today and everything is fine. Do you have anything special running? like beryl
well, except i've been trying to get orca working
but i already tried apt-removing orca festival speech-dispatcher lsr
